Text.Page:
To all soldiers of the Valkyon Federation:

In these dark times we have seen our greatness and our shortcomings. We have known the joys of victory and the bitterness of defeat.

We are exhausted. We have seen our comrades and friends dying on the battlefield. We felt helpless and hopeless, but we rose up at the first opportunity.

You have fought well and with dedication. You have shown the world the power of the Valkyon Federation.

But the battle is not yet won. Join me, brothers and sisters! Together we will change history and send our enemies back to the world of dreams!

I am awaiting you in Kaiator, with a gift.

-Tamur

Welcome, .

Tamur is waiting for you. Head to the command center.

Kaiator, as always, welcomes you, .

I won't retain you any longer. Ukenul has something that will interest you.

I have prepared a unique set of equipment for a soldier of your level. At least, I hope so.

If you don't like it, please, lie and say it's great.
